doc.name: VQDecode
doc.description: This actor decompresses a vector quantized signal. This operation is simply a table lookup into the codebook.
doc.author: Steve Neuendorffer
doc.property: A Parameter of type String, giving the location of the codebook data file relative to the root classpath.

The number of blocks to be decoded during each firing. The default value is one, which will always work, but using a higher number (such as the number of blocks in a frame) will speed things up. This should contain an integer.
The width, in integer pixels, of the block to decode.
The width, in integer pixels, of the block to decode.
